text: tatha usakee kaamana na karo, jisake dvaara allaah ne tumhen ek-doosare par shreshthata dee hai. purushon ke lie usaka bhaag hai, jo unhonne kamaaya[1] aur striyon ke lie usaka bhaag hai, jo unhonne kamaaya hai. tatha allah se usase adhik kee praarthana karate raho. nihsandeh allaah sab kuchh jaanata hai
